data.name: Luffy: Way Back Home
data.detailed_description:
ALSO RECOMMENDED FOR YOU:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1807540/Cat_Swap_Tiles/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1564450/The_Gorcs_Forge/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2023810/Island_Idle_RPG/


About the Game

History


After an unfortunate distraction on a vacation trip, Luffy slips out of the car and ends up in an unknown forest, lost from his family.
Join the kitten equipped with a paper boat, a makeshift paddle and a lot of willpower, on this amazing journey. Solve well-balanced puzzles, get through beautiful and challenging places and help Luffy to find his way back home.

The challenge increases in each level with new mechanics.

Four different biomes





About

Solve unique puzzles with a wonderful, dynamic slide elements. With a few simple mechanics, just click on the peaces to move it to its correct position.

Features

  • 56 well-balanced hand-crafted slide puzzles;
  • Progression of levels: the challenge increases in each level with new mechanics.
  • Avoid or defeat many enemies to help the kitten
  • Hand-crafted beatiful art;
  • Peaceful music and environments;
  • A lovely story;
  • Many Achievements.
  • Just enjoy the game with no score, no timer and no pressure.

To request features, enhancements or comunicate issues join us on our discord channel

data.short_description: Help Luffy - a little but brave kitten - return home to his family on an extraordinary journey through some stunning, yet dangerous and challenging places, all gathered in this relaxing sliding puzzle game. No score, no timer and no pressure.
data.reviews:
“If you enjoy sliding puzzles, this game will be quite enjoyable! It has a heartwarming story and theme to keep you pushing through to help the little guy make his way back to his family. The difficulty was pleasant, I never got frustrated because it always felt manageable. It made me think of new ways to solve the puzzles. The setting to enable numbers on the tiles were a god send though. In the end it was a charming 2 hours for another perfected achievement game.”
Steam Reviewer

“A very cute and relaxing puzzle game. Once you learn the basics of the gameplay it turns really fun. I also love the soundtrack. Recommended!”
Steam Reviewer

“The art is adorable and the puzzles are a nice mix of difficulty pretty nice little game”
Steam Reviewer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Even slower systems run the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible, 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Even slower systems run the game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.7.0
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 5850 or NVidia GeForce GTX 460, and 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Even slower systems run the game.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11.5
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 5850 or NVidia GeForce GTX 460, and 2 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Even slower systems run the game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Even slower systems run the game.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Even slower systems run the game.

highlighted.name: Complete the game without using the hints
Complete the game reseting a stage less than 5 times
